lead_paragraph: Six weeks after becoming the youngest foreigner to score in the Bundesliga, 17-year-old Christian Pulisic became the youngest American in the modern era to get a goal for the national team.

headline.print_headline: Pulisic Gets 1st Goal as US Tops Bolivia 4-0 in Copa Tuneup
headline.main: Pulisic Gets 1st Goal as US Tops Bolivia 4-0 in Copa Tuneup
